original: Savitakkasavicāraṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavitakkasavicāro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pannarasa …pe… avigate pannarasa.

original: Savitakkasavicāraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naavitakkavicāramatto nanahetu dhammo
analyzed: ▁ savitakkasavicār aṃ ▁nahetu ṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na a vitakk a vicār amatt o ▁nan ahetu ▁dhammo

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā aṭṭhavīsa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhavīsa, adhipatiyā
ekūnavīsa …pe… purejāte āsevane ekūnavīsa …pe… avigate aṭṭhavīsa.
